wikipedia.title: Quantum machine learning
wikipedia.summary: Quantum machine learning is an emerging interdisciplinary research area between quantum physics and data mining that summarises efforts to combine methods from quantum information science and machine learning.

facebook.summary: # quant-ph [양자 학습 이론 설문] 저자 : Ronald de Wolf. 이 논문은 양자 학습 이론을 연구한다 : 양자 컴퓨터를 이용한 기계 학습의 이론적 측면. 우리는 세 가지 학습 모델로 알려진 주요 결과를 설명합니다 : 멤버십 쿼리를 통한 정확한 학습, PAC (Probably Approximately Correct) 및 고전 또는 양자 예제의 불가 지론 학습. http://arxiv.org/abs/1701.06806v3, http://ar

news.title: A Hybrid of Quantum Computing and Machine Learning Is Spawning New Ventures
news.summary: Machine learning, the field of AI that allows Alexa and Siri to parse what you say and self-driving cars to safely drive down a city street, could benefit from quantum computer-derived speedups, say researchers.
